system.effect: The Ogryn can wield Basic and Thrown Ranged Weapons, as well as Melee Weapons that do not have the Ogryn-Proof Trait as if they did not have the Clumsy Trait. Any of these weapons that would require Two Hands do not when wielded by this Ogryn.
